page.title: 19Favourite Playground Games
page.content: {Tally Ho}One child counts to 100 and others hide.He searches for them and they have to reach den and say "Tally Ho in" without being caught.If the catcher sees them and shouts" Tally Ho out"(and their name)they are then on. {Foxes and Rabbits}This is like Tig but when you have been tug you are put in a den and the others have to try to tig you to be free again. {Elastic}Two people stand apart with a joined length of elastic stretched between them ,around their legs. Another person jumps into,out of and onto the raised or lowered elastic according to which ryhme is being chanted. Some other games which are also popular are{Chain tig,Tiggy- {off-ground,Tiggy on lines,Hop Scotch {and Skipping(individual and group).} { }
